Name: Musharib
Traits: Dwarven Resilience. Musharib has advantage on saving throws against poison. Innate Spellcasting. Musharib's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:1/day each: hunter's mark, jump, pass without trace, speak with animals, speak with plants
Actions: Handaxe. Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.
